extendedInfo.description: This is the official CorePower Yoga Android Application.The CorePower Yoga class schedule is now mobile for Android!Find your favorite CorePower Yoga class right from your phone. Choose a studio and see the dayâs yoga class schedule. You can view class type, instructor and time, and itâs easy to select a new day or a different studio. Donât miss another class because you didnât have time to check the schedule. The CorePower Yoga App is perfect if youâre on the go!FEATURES:Browse all CorePower Yoga studios nationwideSelect a convenient studio locationImmediately view all yoga classes for the current daySearch the following dayâs classesSearch for classes by studio by choosing a dateApplication automatically defaults to your favorite studio and you can easily adjust to change the studio and view other CorePower Yoga studio schedules in your areaSchedules are updated with the most timely information about instructor substitutes and class changes

reviews.title: Works fine, can see class descriptions too
reviews.comment: I am able to change studio locations from Colorado to Minnesota . You need to click on your phones menu button to change your options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Studio menu doesn\'t load half the time. Try the other free app. It has adds, but you can see a week at a time and it\'s dependable.
reviews.author: Shannon Muir

reviews.title: Have to shut down a lot!
reviews.comment: Have to close app often. Won\'t bring up studio selections.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forces close often
reviews.comment: Extremely convenient. Able to access schedules for studios all over the city. The force close is much too frequent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BUGGY
reviews.comment: This app works great...when it works. For me, that\'s almost never. Constant \'force close\' and empty schedules...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Thanks for adding tustin studio! Still lil buggy. Force closes at times (refreshing)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: It is super helpful app when it works, but thats not often. I am always deleting and reinstalling it, because it force closes, or won\'t let me change studios. Hopefully they can fix these bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: I have used this app on my blackberry and now on my android. On both systems the app frequently fails to load when it is opened. When it does load, it\'s great for checking schedules because it is kept up to date with class cancellations on their website and it includes the schedules for all studios in all states.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start, needs work.
reviews.comment: Average, 3rd party app works better though, this one is ok but needs work to be as nice as the ios version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Unable to change studio.  :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: I am waiting for an update that will include the latest club that opened in my area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great when it works.
reviews.comment: I love this app! The only problem is that it works less than half the time. Forecloses occasionaly. When I try to select a new studio the drop down menus are blank so I\'m stuck on the studio I\'m currently looking at. Please fix!!!! Thunderbolt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: when trying to change location.   Used to work great.  What gives?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: Force closes all the time. Can\'t change location
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow, force closes every time
reviews.comment: I wish this app works. I would use it all the time. It freezes and force closes every time I try to use it. Hopefully they fix it because an app would be so nice.
reviews.author: Amy Regnier

reviews.title: Could be so much better
reviews.comment: App provides basic schedule viewing. Crashes and force close all the time.  Very slow. Core power should be able to do so much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: force close
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t tell me which studio\'s schedule shows up on my screen and when I go to choose a studio, it freezes and then tells me force close.  Useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The app is unreliable and freezes or closes abruptly
reviews.author: Ashlee Delaney

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: It tells me the class schedule for the day and coming days. Helps me plan my workout. The info on the class and the teacher is nice too.
reviews.author: Michael Holm

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: And I can\'t change the studio
reviews.author: A Google User
